website_summaries.verdict: While the Nikon Coolpix P90 brings its performance up to speed with the rest of its class, it now falls behind in photo quality.
pros: two custom settings slots on mode dial

customer_reviews.title: A very nice camera in like new condition
customer_reviews.text: A very nice camera in like new condition. The P90 takes incredible pictures. I had one like this get stolen so I bought this one to replace it. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Neomaxi-Zoom-Dweety!
customer_reviews.text: Low cost, ($366.95 Shipped) full functioned, easy to use camera. I have an expensive professional Nikon setup ($3,500.00) with multiple lenses that is wonderful, but this camera delivers quality shots rapidly and with very little effort. It is much faster at the draw than my expensive setup because you never have to change Lenses. (I keep it in my truck so I never miss a Virginia wildlife shot) The Zoom is 26-624mm Optical, so you have a wide range to go along with the image stabilization and the quality 12.1 Megapixel pictures. It turns on quickly and works as it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: RealNeil

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but still learining!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful point and shoot camera. Just returned from Turkey and needed all functions I could master up to this point. Exceptional zoom capabilities. Only issues were in low light. Pictures were grainy but I discovered a work around by fiddling with the camera. Have found use the tilting LCD screen a real aid to shooting in crowds and "candid/subject unposed" shots. I'm still discovering features. I recommend this highly for those who don't want to step up to a DSLR. I caught it on a day when the price was in the high 200's. Still a great camera at higher price.
customer_reviews.author: DR.MAG

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Good starter camera but not very professional.I do like that the lens comes out to a very far zoom but I do not like that you can't buy and switch lenses.The pictures are ok but I could honestly take the same quality pics with my phone.but not to bad to carry around if you are afraid of ruining your expensive camara.
customer_reviews.author: mayah

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, especially for folks like me that just ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, especially for folks like me that just want to point and shoot. However, it is so hard to replace broken parts. You basically have to rebuy the entire camera.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Good camera!
customer_reviews.text: Good Nikon camera, with excellent zoom capabilities! Takes quite good photos!
customer_reviews.author: Merab Salukvadze

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several cameras and read lots and lots of reviews before deciding on the P90. While some of the reviews talked alot about noise in the pictures I had no problems whatsoever. I did have some in the beginning but once I messed around with ajusting the settings it was great, took over 600 pictures on a recent trip to Egypt and very little if any were deleted due to noise. The zoom feature on this camera is great! overall I gave it a 4 (high 4) as I don't believe there will ever be a perfect camera.
customer_reviews.author: L. LARA

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a nikon camera and this is my first .Have not checked all the features but ,as of now I find it a great camera for its catogory. The one complaint that I read before I purchased the camera was about picture quality and that it was not up to par. I find found this not to be the case with what I have seen so far in the photos I have taken ,again ,not alot of varied use to date but if it preforms to what I have seen so far ,I am more than happy with the camera
customer_reviews.author: William Gee

customer_reviews.title: great sales person
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a five star but battery was warped.Got stuck in camera. Other wise fast delivery,great sales person,took good pic so far lol.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: NIKON COOL PIX P90
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE FALLEN IN LOVE WITH THIS CAMERA IT MAKES ABSOLUTELY THE LARGEST PHOTOS FOR POSTERS WITHOUT THE USUAL GRAININESS. MY PHOTOS ALWAYS LOOK AS REAL AS THE TIME I TOOK THEM. TOOK ME A LITTLE WHILE TO GET USE TO ALL THE COOL FEATURES. BUT WHAT CAN I SAY I AM ALMOST 60 YEARS OLD. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Theresia A. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: OK kind of product from Nikon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera from Amazon before 6-7 months. My experience with this product so far is ok ok. Pros:- 1. Takes good pictures outside during sunny weather 2. Good zoom 24x Cons:- 1. Started appearing verticle lines in LCD while viewing 2. Takes very poor pictures inside or during night (I am not sure if I am missing any settings but I have used Nikon products in the past) 3. Not worth of the cost I would suggest viewers to check out different options. Regards Nir
customer_reviews.author: NirJ

customer_reviews.title: Still learning, but love what we've been able to do so far.
customer_reviews.text: We got this camera specifically to take pictures of our hand crafted Malas and Rosaries, Necklaces and Bracelets. We needed magnification that could show the intricate nature of our loops and twists and the beauty of our beads. Although we are not professional photographers at all, we got beautiful pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jagadambes

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. My husband has a very expensive Nikon D5000 which I tried. It takes good pictures but you need very expensive lenses for it. I am an artist and wanted to be able to paint birds, flowers etc. The camera is light, easy to hold, and takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy B. McDonell, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: For day pictures the best, for photos at night forget it
customer_reviews.text: Very good functions and features, but just a bit low light the auto focus doesn't work and a lot noise appears in the pictures and green hues. If there is good light the photos that are achieved are amazing
customer_reviews.author: OSCAR MORA V

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P90
customer_reviews.text: Picture and stabliztion is good overall a very good camera. However, I brought this camera for the camera as well as for the quick video feature and the video quality was not very good and the zoom feature did not work for the video like for pictures. I thought because the pixels were higher for pictures the videos well also be better but I was very disappointed by the video quality. I am thinking now I have to buy a camcorder for the better video.
customer_reviews.author: Customer5691

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P90 Camera Review
customer_reviews.text: This camera has many features that allow for either quick "capture the moment" photos or custom setup for a special shot - has many features that you would expect from a much more expensive camera at a very good price
customer_reviews.author: JMcKay

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P90
customer_reviews.text: A great outdoors camera for travel, scenery, daylight portraits, architecture, and landscape pics. The quality of it's low light and indoor pictures is not so good...should have probably gotten the more expensive Nikon D90.
customer_reviews.author: McCaptain

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best camerai have ever owned. No need for gadgets. So many options built in. Love the view finder.use it more than screen. I guess that is from my SLR days. I thought the tilt screen would come in handy, but hardly use it. One other thing, unlike so many things, the owners manual is easy to understand. This is very important.
customer_reviews.author: Bylion

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. I even received it before the estimated date. It takes great pictures and I still have a lot to learn about using it. The quality of the pictures and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mamac83429

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I am no photo fan. I just wanted to own a powerful, easy to use, high quality camera to shoot family portraits, places I visit, and some engineering projects I am managing. My Nikon Coolpix P90 succesfully fulfilled all I needed. After playing with the camera, it became natural tu use it. I shooted some great photos. I plan to learn more about it so I can take full advantege of its multiple options. Alejandro Koweindl
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Koweindl

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix p90
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about how great this camera is! Do not waste your money on the D40's, you'll spend twice as much on a camera that doesn't do half as much as the 90 does. It is functional, fast, and flexible! It is not hard to pick up and start taking great pictures, and if you read the book a couple times through you pretty much know everything you need too to take the best pictures you could want. Buy it and become your own photographer for weddings and portraits. I did!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the camera all except for the battery pack. I would rather have AA, but the lithium battery holds up well, but it is hard to tug the charger around with you all the time.
customer_reviews.author: SacJester

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: well i thought before i got it that it would never do what i wanted. i wanted to take pictures of birds, then enlarge them so i could identify them in my book. i am a beginning bird watcher. Well i was wrong....i can take the picture and then enlarge them again..and crop, change the lighting. i am very pleased with the camera...If a 56 yr. old woman can create great photos....any one can!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this camera recently and find the product to be beyond my expectations. In my opinion it is not a point and shoot, it offers much more. You have to take the time to educate yourself on the features and capabilities of this product. Nikon has developed a fine product that I highly recommend. So far image quality,build and options are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: GaryR

customer_reviews.title: They have fun with the zoom
customer_reviews.text: Got for my daughter and she loves it along with her friends. They have fun with the zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Its OK. not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: The photo quality is not that much good as that of canon has in the same range. But when we take snaps in the day time, they are good but when you take in dark even with flash, the quality is poor. The 24x zoom makes the most but still the photo quality is a drawback. Canon in the same range would be a better choice. For me, since I got this for a less price(deal), this is OK for me.
customer_reviews.author: Siva D

customer_reviews.title: The wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Went to Alaska with this camera. Took over 1,000 pictures. It is hard to tell people how beautiful Alaska is but this camera certainly makes it easier.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tutor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is good for outdoor bit not suitable for indoor shooting .
customer_reviews.author: ABDULLAH M.

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: easy to use but needs a bigger memory card and i didnt get an instruction manual with it i would highly recommend getting one with a manual!
customer_reviews.author: Ava M. Jahoda

customer_reviews.title: F'ing GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I have ever had. Easy to use. Once you read the manual, it is amazing the things this little guy can do. A WINNER!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good choice because I'm trying to remember how to take good photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy for a very good price
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with the camera we purchased. We have found that the battery does not last very long in this one unlike another one we have just like it. It seems to run hot as well. Other than that, it works great! We are hoping maybe it's just the battery that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for the price!
customer_reviews.text: With 12.1 megapixels and 25x optical zoom this Nikon camera is the best buy you can find! The weight is nice to handle and it fits nicely in my hands. I received the camera in a very short time and it was packed well. I have no problem ordering an above-priced item through Amazon again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the Nikon Cool Pix P90 I'm still learning features of the camera but I have gotten some very nice digital photos. Nice for a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P90 Great for Nature/Wildlife/Scenery Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for outdoor nature/wildlife...did not have correct setting chosen for low light indoor pictures..will experiment until I learn the best settings. Most of my photography is nature/scenery...so it should be excellent camera for me. It takes great snow pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Glen S.

customer_reviews.title: An improved cmera
customer_reviews.text: I used to own a P80 and I am very happy with the several improvements of the P90!
customer_reviews.author: Gabor Koves

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: Camera is an upgrade from a Kodak point and shoot. Good zoom. Some pix seem to be good quality, some mediocre. Still learning the many options, maybe too many to be honest - would rather have a higher quality LCD.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera on family reunion Got great scenery pictures along with womderful pictures of the family. Found it easy to use and the quality of the pictures was wonderful. I am very happy with my decision to buy this model.
customer_reviews.author: Judy N

customer_reviews.title: mostly very good
customer_reviews.text: Over all, I am very pleased; but am disappointed with the clarity of long range shots. at full 24 X or close, the focus is not that good.
customer_reviews.author: Doris mac Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is really a very good camera in range of $400. Frankly speaking if u r interested in DSLR, then don't go for it. But if u r looking for good camera (but not DSLR). This has very good results & good features. Must buy if u r interested in 24 x zoom + 12 mega pixel camera. So overall it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Kumar

customer_reviews.title: CoolCam
customer_reviews.text: if u want to point & shoot this is the cam for you. Great looking pics
customer_reviews.author: JBlanco

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Not a great point & shoot camera but a nice advanced camera that can take good pictures when set up properly. Impressive zoom that with the digital zoom will extend to the limits of what can be handheld. It is recommended that a tripod be used at the highest zoom levels.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: The compactness is impressive -- the ability to have so much in such a small package. I use it mostly in macro mode and is wonderful I like taking pictures in natural light without a flash and this camera does very well
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Beckwin

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect camera for someone who is not a professional yet wants some shots that a digital camera with minimal zoom options just can not get. I specifically got it to take pictures of my children especially when they have performances and I need to zoom. It is obviously a little bulkier than my digital so I will not likely take it to disney or anything, but to take pictures at my childs birthday party or take it to the park for snap shots it has had amazing quality!! I love it! Exactly what I wanted. I am still figuring out all the features of what it can do but am impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Dunham

customer_reviews.title: fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: This product surprised me a lot. It is not a compactible camera, but it it easy do use with a lot of functions. The price is good. I was looking for a camera between the regular commercial amateur camera and the professional one that is too expensive. I found this one and i am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Prada A. Duarte

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid purchase - giveslots of fun to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Needs lots of attention to set up the details in a way one desires, however, it pays off. Comes with quality nikon lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buehl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Simple and easy to use and best of all the pictures are amazing. Highly recommend! The videos are of superior quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: What a great camera. I had a professional Nikon and finally sold it. I just could never quite take that perfect picture with it. With this one, you have the option to point and shoot or use it like you would a pro. Can't ask for more and the price beats the Digital SLR cameras.
customer_reviews.author: bleezer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and a little overwhelming, once I scanned the manual for some items that needed explanation, this camera takes the best pictures. Head and shoulders above your normal point-n-shoot, I've not found a photo situation that this camera could not handle. Killer !
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Focus
customer_reviews.text: I agree with every one star comment made. I've been using Nikons since 1968(Nikon FTN) I currently use a Nikon D300 and a D200 and a range of Nikon Lens. This is ,witout doubt, the worst camera I have ever used. I bought this for my wife and I use it when I climb. The biggest problem is it will not focus and this is only one of the many problems already mentioned. If somebody trys to give you one refuse it. It's that bad.
customer_reviews.author: jjd1946

customer_reviews.title: One of the best digital cameras on the market
customer_reviews.text: Love this Nicon P90 camera. It's loaded with features only found in more expensive cameras and no need to change lenses because of the 26mm to 624mm equivalent zoom of a 35mm film camera. The tilt screen works great.
customer_reviews.author: Russell M. Hossack

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera the Nikon P90
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my Nikon P90. It has a lot of possibilities, and makes beautiful pictures and film. Wonderful zoom, and love the powershop option. I still haven't found out all its possibilities, but to get started was relatively easy. Great camera, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: K. Couvret

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding service !
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this camera on th next day Nikon Co advertise the rebate of $30 for new buy . I send email then received reply that I need to provide the serial number ... exactly 1 week I have received notice that my amazon account had been refund with amount of $30 . Imagine how its be quick within 1 week and with 1 email ! This kind of customer care is so wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Tan C. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: THank you very much
customer_reviews.text: THis is my first camera and so far I love it .. It is a challenge but i love to work with cameras and get to know them. I love the features but learning more and more about it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gant

customer_reviews.title: The Camera is a very good
customer_reviews.text: Hi. This camera is a very good. The zoom is excelent and with 12.1mp.. wow!! is very very good. The picture quality is good. The ligth is a factor very import to have good images. This camera is not a SLR camera. But is very versatile and convenient to out sites: montain, beach, party, ...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Morales

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P90
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera and the picture quality is horrible. The pictures look pixelated and unclear. I sent the camera in to Nikon to have it fixed and when it came back, the pictures where still blurry or pixelated. This is absolutely the worst camera that I have ever used. Don't buy it. Don't even think about buying it. I teach a yearbook class and have many Nikon cameras, and have always had good luck with Nikon. This camera, on the other hand works about as good as a $29 camera. h[...]
customer_reviews.author: hogjaw

customer_reviews.title: Save your money. Get a Dslr..
customer_reviews.text: This camera is okay.. It's great if youre just getting into photography, but for the price you could be getting a decent Dslr. i quickly returned this after not being satisfied and then bought a Nikon D3000 and its superb.
customer_reviews.author: Ryley Dipaola

customer_reviews.title: Just a point and shoot?
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Nikon and previously owned a S8700 which was fantastic until it just stopped working. So I went about looking for a Nikon and ended up selecting the P90 because all I wanted was a point and shoot with great zoom. Well little did I know that I would be sacrificing picture quality!! Cannot get myself happy with the quality of the pictures at all and would sincerely love to return this!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Sabga

customer_reviews.title: great camera for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to take good photos, until now. Great pictures,easy to use, lightweight, and FUN
customer_reviews.author: J. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for someone who wants to take really nice pictures without paying the price of a SLR. If you read the manual, and take advantage of the camera's features, you can take great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: K. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P90
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Camera. Too many control setting. I keep on Auto for most part of taking pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have not had this camera very long, so haven't utilized all it's great features, but have liked everything about it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Emory

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P90 Review
customer_reviews.text: Easy usable Camera, with high quality pictures with 12.1 Megapixel is more easier, with it's superzoom world seems closer, just perfect for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gachechiladze

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so lovely. Fantastic, really. Light-weight, has every "bell and whistle" you can ever want. Absolutely great. If I have a "complaint" it would be only that I don't have enough time to learn everything it will do. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Irene's mom

customer_reviews.title: camera = happiness
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my girlfriend. She is very happy so I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Have not has long enough for good review
customer_reviews.text: Gift for husband he seems real happy with it. However there has not been enough usage for approriate review. For example we have not had any photos printed as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Hensley

customer_reviews.title: P90 Xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Was much more than I expected and arrived just as said it would. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Terry Newman

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix P90
customer_reviews.text: I have a Canon Rebel XT SLR digital as my primary camera, but wanted something less expensive for every day use. I enjoy the P90, especially the zoom and the 3" LCD, but I advise you to buy at least one extra battery, as those features eat up the battery very quickly! I have used the video feature, and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for more.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the camera is good. I just wish I could say something about the pictures. Indoor pictures turn out very orange and somewhat blurry.
customer_reviews.author: P. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: I got a Nikon!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera does everything you want and more. Lots of presets. I you use this for a $$ shoot then workwith it first. You don't have time to fiddle during an event. Experiment over and over. You really can't make a bad exposure. If you do... the software provided will teach you to fix.....
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Grillo

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed, camera with problems
customer_reviews.text: I got my new camera, opened it and tried it only to find out that pictures were shot with a redish glow and autofocus did not work properly. Completely dissapointed with my first purchase through amazon. I am beggining to think the camera was used o refurbished as it has an obvious problem with the quality of the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera a lot but I think the pictures could be a little sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Scharman

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P90 Thoughts after use
customer_reviews.text: Tried both the P90 and the L100, the P90 pictures were never of a very good quality, the lower cost L100 consistantly took much better pictures that did this model... Thats basically it, why bother about the different features if the primary reason of a camera, it's pictures, are not that good...
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tomczak

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this camera. Tried two of them and both had poor picture quality. My old Panasonic camera was far superior to this Nikon. I was once a photographer and used Nikon equipment. They had some of the best 35mm stuff. But I am not impressed with their digital stuff. Very happy with Amazon customer service. It is the best and saved me a lot of hassle. Would buy from Amazon again
customer_reviews.author: K. Hively

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P9o 12MP digital camera.
customer_reviews.text: I checked the reviews on Amazon for this camera before buying it..I am very satisfied with its' performance & ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Elspeth Kick

customer_reviews.title: SONY takes better PICS
customer_reviews.text: Slow focusing, bad quality, do not buy this camera. I love Nikon, this one needs to be redone.
customer_reviews.author: Geek

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good camera for beginner
customer_reviews.text: I love my p90 very much! Easy use + Great pix quality But the life of battery is kinda...short Every two days, I have to recharge it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lay

customer_reviews.title: horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible camera unless you are in well lit areas and it's a still picture. Wish I had not purchased it. Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: David J. Harthman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I`m glad with my new Nikon camera purchased at amazon. it is what I expected when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Maqque

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix P90 12.1MP Digital Camera with 24x Wide Angle Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 3 inch Tilt LCD
product_meta.description:
Experience even closer encounters with Nikon’s Coolpix P90, with 12.1 effective megapixels and an incredible 24x optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens for stunning prints as large as 16x20 inches. The camera's bright, 3.0-inch high-resolution vari-angle LCD and Electronic Viewfinder make it easy to compose and share your pictures. And Nikon’s new 4 Way VR Image Stabilization makes incredible pictures incredibly easy. Nikon’s New Smart Portrait System, which automatically detects your subjects face, takes a picture when they smile and warns you if they blinked.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Experience even closer encounters with Nikon’s Coolpix P90, with 12.1 effective megapixels and an incredible 24x optical Zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens for stunning prints as large as 16x20 inches. The camera's bright, 3.0-inch high-resolution vari-angle LCD and Electronic Viewfinder make it easy to compose and share your pictures. And Nikon’s new 4 Way VR Image Stabilization makes incredible pictures incredibly easy. Nikon’s New Smart Portrait System, which automatically detects your subjects face, takes a picture when they smile and warns you if they blinked. 

Coolpix P90 Highlights 

12.1-megapixel resolution for stunning prints as large as 20 x 30 inches 

24x optical wide-angle (35mm equivalent focal length: 26-624mm) Zoom-Nikkor ED glass lens provides exceptional images throughout the zoom range 

Bright 3.0-inch Vari-Angle LCD and Electronic Viewfinder makes it easy to compose and share your pictures with friends and family 

New EXPEED image processor concept ensures high-quality pictures with stunning color and sharpness 

4-Way VR Image Stabilization

 * Nikon’s Optical VR image stabilization compensated for the effects of camera shake by moving the image sensor 
 * Motion Detection automatically detects moving subjects and adjusts shutter speed and the ISO setting to compensate for cameras hake and subject movement 
 * High ISO 6400 capability helps give you sharper results when shooting in low light or capturing fast-moving subjects. ISO 3200 and 6400 are available at 3MP or lower resolution 
 * Nikon’s original Best Shot Selector (BSS) automatically takes up to 10 shots while the shutter is pressed and saves the sharpest image 

Program, Shutter Priority, Aperture Priority and Manual Exposure modes gives ultimate control over your pictures 

New Sports Continuous Scene Mode for shooting at up to 15fps, up to 45 frames, when you set the resolution to 3MP or lower 

Nikon’s Smart Portrait System:  * In-Camera Red-Eye Fix automatically fixes most instances of red-eye in the camera. You may never see red-eye again 
 * Face-Priority AF - Nikon’s face-finding technology that automatically focuses on faces 
 * Smile Mode automatically releases the shutter when your subject smiles 
 * Blink Warning displays a warning message, should the camera detect your subject has blinked
